nodes.text: The Savareen system was a star system located in the Outer Rim Territories' Savareen sector. It was the origin point of the Savareen brandy beverage, and shared its name with the luxury liner Savareen Dancer and the Savareen whist card game.
The Savareen system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed it within grid square Q-16.
